text: Hagi kesga huta Saioni agonare tamavua keho, ana kumatera ne'zama kreta neneta musema hanaza kuma huhamprinte'ne. Ana hu'neankino Jerusalemi kumate'ma masaza vahetera mago zamo'a zamazeri havizana osanige'za, knare huza mani'nesageta kegahaze. Mago seli nomo oti hanavetinege'za tagana vaziza reonamagige, zafa'a eri okasige, nofi'amo ruru ovaziankna huno Jurusalemi kuma'mo'a oti hankavetigahie.
